mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT p.* FROM sys_permission p WHERE ( EXISTS ( SELECT a.id FROM sys_role_permission a JOIN sys_role b ON a.role_id = b.id JOIN sys_user_role c ON c.role_id = b.id JOIN sys_user d ON d.id = c.user_id WHERE p.id = a.permission_id AND d.username = 'admin' ) ) AND p.del_flag = 0 ) h ORDER BY h.sort_no ASC
